column2: line1 <- "The table was a larger one, but the three were all crowded together at one corner of it:"
"The table was a larger one, but the three were all crowded together at one corner of it:"
line2 <- ' "No room! No room!" they cried out when they saw Alice coming.'
" \"No room! No room!\" they cried out when they saw Alice coming."
# Line 3 - use double ( "), string has both (") and ('), need to use escape (\)
line3 <- "\"There's plenty of room!\" said Alice indignantly, and she sat down in a large arm-chair at one end of the table."
"\"There's plenty of room!\" said Alice indignantly, and she sat down in a large arm-chair at one end of the table."
